question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Compensatory Afforestation Fund Management and Planning Authority?
1) It was established in 2003.
2) It is meant to promote afforestation and regeneration activities.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Compensatory Afforestation Fund Management and Planning Authority is meant to promote afforestation and regeneration activities. It was established in 2001 by the orders of the supreme court of India.
